description.narrative: Here is a link to UNDP's homepage where there is a wealth of information including annual reports on results etc.: www.undp.org

UNDP’s vision is to help countries achieve sustainable development by eradicating poverty in all its forms and dimensions, accelerating structural transformations for sustainable development and building resilience to crises and shocks.
The key priorities for Denmark’s strategic support to UNDP in 2018-2022 are to enable the organisation to deliver development responses in crisis contexts and regions characterised by fragility, as well as critical support to democratic governance and peacebuilding processes, including in countries of particular priority for Denmark, and to pursue organisational effectiveness in its operations at all levels and maximize development impact through innovation and fit for purpose staffing.

organisation.narrative: Permanent Mission of Denmark to the United Nations, New York, USA

mailing-address.narrative: Chrysler East Building, 666 Third Avenue, 11th Floor
